Interface WapService

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    AnnotationService, ContainerService
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractWapService, AnnotationServiceImpl, ContainerServiceImpl

    public interface WapService
    Base interface for WapServices
    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    Matthias Dressel, Michael Hitzker, Markus Hoefler, Andreas Loeffler, Timo Schmidt

    • Method Summary

      Annotation getAnnotation(java.lang.String iri)
      Gets the Annotation denoted by the given IRI
      boolean isValidInputFormat(Format format)
      Checks whether a given format is valid for usage in PUT/POST requests

    • Method Detail

      • isValidInputFormat

        boolean isValidInputFormat(Format format)
        Checks whether a given format is valid for usage in PUT/POST requests
        Parameters:
        format - The format to check for validity
        Returns:
        true if format can be used, false otherwise

      • getAnnotation

        Annotation getAnnotation(java.lang.String iri)
                  throws WapException
        Gets the Annotation denoted by the given IRI
        Parameters:
        iri - The IRI of the annotation
        Returns:
        The annotation requested
        Throws:
        WapException - In case any errors occurred
